summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1503, for the improvement of Olympic Way in the City of Seattle from 8th Avenue West to 10th Avenue West, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon under Ordinance No. 16014 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
